testcase.name: execute() should play a valid card and update the game state
execute() should fail for an invalid card
undo() should revert the game state to before the card was played
redo() should reapply the playing of the card

failure.message: Failure(java.lang.IllegalStateException: Card cannot be redone on the current top card) was not an instance of scala.util.Success, but an instance of scala.util.Failure

testcase.name: undo() without a prior execute should fail
redo() without a prior execute should fail
redo() should fail if the card cannot be replayed
